public String listStudents(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

        "main" page.

                method=GET)
public String deleteStudents(@PathVariable
                                   String id,
                                   org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
                      throws WebException

        id - Get student id.

        Returns:
        "redirect:/list" to main page.

      • saveStudent

        @RequestMapping(value="/new",
                method=POST)
public String saveStudent(Student student,
                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
                   throws WebException
        This method create new student. Check validation field on student pojo.
        Parameters:
        student - Valid pojo.
        result - Processing request for errors on valid.
        model - Spring Model for work with form attribute.
        redirectAttributes - Spring model for send success response.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/list" redirect to main page.

        WebException - catch ServException.
